name: Tumblr - Klaine icon set 2
description: Back by request - the Dalton edition of the Klaine icon set! Replace your Tumblr home, inbox, help, preferences, and logout buttons with a Dalton Academy logo, a Lima Bean coffee mug, Blaine's bow tie, the Warblers logo (to represent Pavarotti), and a rose!

user.name: GeekintheJeep
user.about:
A 24-year old geek who happens to have inadvertently stumbled into this Tumblr editing stuff.

Contact me here or on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any questions or requests!
